text: avarkaḷuṭaiya naṟkūli, avarkaḷuṭaiya iṟaivaṉiṭattiluḷḷa atṉu eṉṉum cuvarkkac cōlaikaḷākum. Avaṟṟiṉ kīḻē āṟukaḷ ōṭikkoṇṭu irukkum; avaṟṟil avarkaḷ eṉṟeṉṟum taṅkiyiruppārkaḷ; allāhvum avarkaḷaip paṟṟi, tirupti aṭaivāṉ, avarkaḷum avaṉaippaṟṟi tirupti aṭaivārkaḷ; taṉ iṟaivaṉukkup payappaṭukiṟārē attakaiyavarukkē inta mēlāṉa nilai uṇṭākum
